devdoc.details: This contract performs a two-stage swap:      1. PT token  underlying asset (via Pendle)      2. underlying asset  target token (via Odos)

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

returns._0: True if token implements PT interface

getActualCollateralToken(address,bool).details: Get the actual collateral token address

params._isUnstakeCollateralToken: Whether the collateral token is unstaked

isPTToken(address).details: This can be used by external callers to determine if they should use this contract

returns.isPT: True if the token appears to be a PT token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: FlashMintLiquidatorAaveBorrowRepayPTOdos

PTApprovalFailed().notice: Custom error when PT token approval fails

PendleSwapFailed().notice: Custom error for failed Pendle swap with no revert reason

checkPTInterface(address).notice: External function to check PT interface (called by isPTToken)

isPTToken(address).notice: Helper function to check if a token is a PT token

version().notice: Get the contract version for identification

userdoc.notice: Flash mint liquidator contract that handles PT token liquidations with Pendle + Odos swaps
